trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_restriction" name="restriction" href=""></xref> element for simple types from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: Jelzi a <xref uid="langword_csharp_restriction" name="restriction" href=""> </xref> elem az egyszerű típusok, a webes Consortium (W3C) által megadott XML-séma.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used restricting <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály korlátozása használható <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""> </xref> elemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information on the base type.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja az adatokat az alaptípusnál.

trans-unit.source: The use of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction.BaseTypeName%2A> and `BaseType` are mutually exclusive.
The base type for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Az alaptípus a <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""> </xref> elemet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the qualified base type.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a minősített alaptípus nevét.

trans-unit.source: The use of `BaseTypeName` and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction.BaseType%2A> are mutually exclusive.
The qualified name of the simple type restriction base type.
trans-unit.target: Az egyszerű típusú korlátozás alaptípus minősített neve.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an Xml Schema facet.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja az XML-séma értékkorlátozás.

trans-unit.source: One of the following facet classes: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaPatternFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaEnumerationFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFractionDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaTotalDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the following facet classes: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaPatternFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaEnumerationFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFractionDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaTotalDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet"></xref>.
